nodes.bodyText: Does this need to be in a separate class? The reason BasePersonDao is separated out is because there are a number of resources that all use Person and need to have similar logic, but the logic here seems pretty specific to RelatedPerson. Or is there something I'm missing?

Hi @ibacher  I think atleast we have to get the use of BasePersonDao class. Since we need to have all the personrelated sort stuff in the relatedperson as well.
but anyway if we are not maintaining a sperate class I think its better to alter the
handleSort in the base dao to include a person alisa parameter as we did for the name search/
wdyt?
@ibacher  waiting for youre response on this
I just meant "do we need a BaseRelatedPersonDao class or can we move all of this into RelatedPersonDao?" We aren't really reusing BasePersonDao here at all.
of course, it's a great way. Sorry for this.
I don't think we actually need this unless we're actually reusing the BasePersonDao class.
Basically, this can be hard-coded where needed
true thanks I fixed the mistake
that's a good catch yes this is bad
